Package it.unimi.di.prog2.l05

Class Arrays2

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unimi.di.prog2.l05.Arrays2
  • public class Arrays2
extends Object
    This class provides a number of standalone procedures that are useful for manipulating arrays of ints.

    This version contains just the implementaion of Figure 3.6.

    • Method Detail

      • sort

        public static void sort​(int[] a)
        Sorts the given array.

        Rearranges the elements of a into ascending order; e.g., if a = [3, 1, 6, 1] before the call, on return a = [1, 1, 3, 6].

        Parameters:
        a - the array of elements to be sorted; it will be modified inplace.

      • quickSort

        private static void quickSort​(int[] a,
                              int low,
                              int high)
        Sorts a subvector in ascending order using the quick sort algorithm.

        Sorts a[low], a[low + 1], …, a[high] into ascending order.

        Parameters:
        a - the vector containing the subvector to be sorted, must not be null; it will be modified inplace.
        low - the first index of the subvector to sort, 0 <= low.
        high - the last index of the subvector to sort, high < a.length .

      • partition

        private static int partition​(int[] a,
                             int i,
                             int j)
        Partitions a subvector.

        Reorders the elements in a into two contiguous groups, a[i], …, a[res] and a[res + 1],…, a[j], such that each element in the second group is at least as large as each element of the first group.

        Parameters:
        a - is not null; it will be modified inplace.
        i - 0 <= i.
        j - j < a.length.
        Returns:
        res.
